name: GlueTool
modelDescription: Execute AWS Glue commands including Data Catalog queries. ALWAYS provide params object. Examples: GetDatabases {command:'GetDatabases', params:{}}. GetDatabase {command:'GetDatabase', params:{Name:'my-database'}}. GetTables {command:'GetTables', params:{DatabaseName:'my-database'}}. GetTable {command:'GetTable', params:{DatabaseName:'my-database', Name:'my-table'}}. GetPartitions {command:'GetPartitions', params:{DatabaseName:'my-database', TableName:'my-table'}}. ListCrawlers {command:'ListCrawlers', params:{}}. GetCrawler {command:'GetCrawler', params:{Name:'my-crawler'}}. CreateJob {command:'CreateJob', params:{Name:'my-job', Role:'arn:aws:iam::...:role/...', Command:{Name:'glueetl'}}}. StartJobRun {command:'StartJobRun', params:{JobName:'my-job'}}.
userDescription: Manage Glue ETL jobs, triggers, crawlers, and query Data Catalog (databases, tables, partitions, connections)

params.description: REQUIRED parameters object. Always include this even if empty. Provide Name/JobName/ResourceArn as needed.

Name.description: Job or trigger name (Used by: CreateJob (Required), GetTrigger (Required), StartJobRun (Required))

JobName.description: Job name (Used by: GetJob (Required), GetJobRun (Required), GetJobRuns (Required), StartJobRun (Required))

LogUri.description: S3 URI for job logs (Used by: CreateJob)

Timeout.description: Job timeout in minutes (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

MaxCapacity.description: Maximum capacity for DPU units (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

NumberOfWorkers.description: Number of workers (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

SecurityConfiguration.description: Security configuration name (Used by: CreateJob, StartJobRun)

nextToken.description: Pagination token (Used by: GetJobRuns, GetTriggers, ListJobs, ListTriggers)

MaxResults.description: Maximum items to return (Used by: GetJobRuns, GetTriggers, ListJobs, ListTriggers)

DependencyJobName.description: Filter by dependency job name (Used by: GetTriggers)

DependentJobName.description: Filter by dependent job name (Used by: ListTriggers)

CatalogId.description: Catalog ID (Used by: GetDatabase, GetDatabases, GetTable, GetTables, GetPartitions)

DatabaseName.description: Database name (Used by: GetDatabase (Required), GetTable (Required), GetTables (Required), GetPartitions (Required))

Segment.description: Segment configuration for parallel scanning (Used by: GetPartitions)
